name: resource-sharing-service
description: A scalable resource sharing system with multi-level access control

scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db && npm run verify
scripts.setup:db: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup:fresh: npm run db:reset && npm run verify
scripts.verify: npm run health && npm run db:verify && echo 'âœ… All systems operational!'
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || echo 'âŒ Server not running. Run: npm run dev'
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run start:db && npm run db:reset && npm run dev
scripts.dev:db: npm run db:studio & npm run dev
scripts.docs:serve: echo 'API docs will be available at http://localhost:3000/docs when server is running' && npm run dev
scripts.full:setup: npm install && npm run setup && echo 'ğŸ‰ Setup complete! Run: npm run dev'
scripts.shutdown: npm run shutdown:services && npm run clean && echo 'âœ… Graceful shutdown complete'
scripts.shutdown:services: npm run stop:server && npm run stop:db
scripts.shutdown:nuclear: npm run shutdown:services && npm run clean:database && npm run clean:full && echo 'ğŸ’¥ Nuclear cleanup complete - everything reset!'
scripts.stop:server: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -TERM 2>/dev/null || echo 'â„¹ï¸  No server running on port 3000'
scripts.stop:db: brew services stop postgresql@15 || echo 'â„¹ï¸  PostgreSQL service not running'
scripts.start:db: brew services start postgresql@15 && sleep 2 && echo 'âœ… PostgreSQL started'
scripts.clean:database: npm run stop:db && sleep 1 && npm run start:db && (/opt/homebrew/Cellar/postgresql@15/15.13/bin/dropdb resource_sharing_db 2>/dev/null || dropdb resource_sharing_db 2>/dev/null || echo 'â„¹ï¸  Database already removed')
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && rm -rf .env prisma/migrations && npm cache clean --force
scripts.restart: npm run shutdown && npm run start:db && npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.restart:fresh: npm run shutdown:nuclear && npm run start:db && npm run full:setup && npm run dev
